## Test 1: Basic Multiple Choice

A simple question with 4 options.

::: {.puzzle-box}
**Question:** What is the capital of Germany?

<div class="quiz-options">
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">Munich</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="true">Berlin</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">Hamburg</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">Frankfurt</button>
</div>

<div class="quiz-actions">
  <p class="quiz-feedback"></p>
  <button class="quiz-submit" disabled>Submit</button>
</div>
:::

---

## Test 2: Math Notation (MathJax)

Testing that mathematical notation renders correctly in options.

::: {.puzzle-box}
**Question:** Which equation represents a quadratic function?

<div class="quiz-options">
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">$f(x) = 2x + 3$</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="true">$f(x) = x^2 - 4x + 1$</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">$f(x) = \frac{1}{x}$</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">$f(x) = \sqrt{x}$</button>
</div>

<div class="quiz-actions">
  <p class="quiz-feedback"></p>
  <button class="quiz-submit" disabled>Submit</button>
</div>
:::

---

## Test 3: With Explanation

Testing the explanation feature (shown after correct answer).

::: {.puzzle-box}
**Question:** What is $2^{10}$?

<div class="quiz-options">
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">512</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="true" data-explanation="2&lt;sup&gt;10&lt;/sup&gt; = 1024 because 2&lt;sup&gt;5&lt;/sup&gt; × 2&lt;sup&gt;5&lt;/sup&gt; = 32 × 32 = 1024">1024</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">2048</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">1000</button>
</div>

<div class="quiz-actions">
  <p class="quiz-feedback"></p>
  <button class="quiz-submit" disabled>Submit</button>
</div>
:::

---

## Test 4: Custom Penalty Time

Testing configurable penalty timer (5 seconds instead of default 10).

::: {.puzzle-box}
**Question:** Which planet is closest to the Sun?

<div class="quiz-options">
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">Venus</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="true">Mercury</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">Earth</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">Mars</button>
</div>

<div class="quiz-actions">
  <p class="quiz-feedback"></p>
  <button class="quiz-submit" data-penalty="5" disabled>Submit</button>
</div>
:::

## Test 5: Shuffle Disabled

Testing the ability to disable randomization (options stay in authored order).

::: {.puzzle-box}
**Question:** Put these in order: Which comes first alphabetically?

<div class="quiz-options" data-shuffle="false">
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="true">Apple</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">Banana</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">Cherry</button>
  <button class="quiz-option" data-correct="false">Date</button>
</div>

<div class="quiz-actions">
  <p class="quiz-feedback"></p>
  <button class="quiz-submit" disabled>Submit</button>
</div>
:::
